name: Traffic Death Moto 2015
description:
Now play Traffic Death Moto and become a master in Moto Racing.this is a 3D fast traffic heat racer game, where you can ride your dream heavy bike at your desired speed, no limits! Get ready for the most exhilarating handheld racing experience! A tense endless motorbike racer game to dodge the traffic and deadly obstacles. You have to avoid monster truck, bikes, bus, and race as long as you can! Set high records! Compete your friends. You will be riding around whole world facing hard riders with their powerful motorcycles!
Traffic Death Moto Game Features:
- A Gravity Defying Experience
- High-Speed Aerial Stunts in an Intense Driving Experience
- Super Bikes and Stunning Graphics
- Easily Equitable Game-play Design
- Go Wild on the super highway!
More Features:
- one finger control model that you can play it very easy but fast-paced
- tilt phone to control car direction
- tap screen to accelerate (boost the speed)
- visually stunning and built for speed
Bullet physics engine support, realistic bike physics effects. Buckle up! youíre in for the ride of the best racing experience. Feel the intensity of no brakes allowed street racing with the best 3D racing visuals. Go ahead with dogging monster trucks, cars, buses and lite vehicles.
Download it and install it on your smart phone and you really love it.
